message.body: Will u b home for dinner, and around when? Hope h r enjoying the beautiful weather!
I think so but in probably going out afterwards. FYI one of my friends is going to Simmons!
Ok keep me posted. Exciting! What's her name?
It's lyra, my debate friend
Excellent. She will love it. Is she the radical one?
Yeah haha. She's gay and she's really into feminism and heteronormativity
Ok give me her full name later and I'll email my friend the dean of students Sarah neill
Ok. What board are you on for Simmons?
The board of trustees. It's the governing body working with the president and other senior administration.
You got a package! I think from Carolyn mulligan.
Sent u an email w a video clip for Lyra
Called mens wearhouse. We have to order the tux by Monday to have it ready for the 22nd. So let's plan on Monday after school.
Ok that's great. Im getting the discount on Monday
Good. There's one right by your school but I don't want to go there so well go to the one on 6th ave and 20th
Can I read ur book replay? Where'd u get it?
Yeah sure. My English teacher gave it to me
Because of Emory I guess
Yeah
When r u commg home? JJ and I are starting a movie
I'll be home by 12
Ok
Where r u?
I'm out front with Devon and Christian
I'm in the vicinity so let me know when u get here
Train ran local. Just got off at 14th. Walking there now
Everything copasetic?
Yes
Good. Did u forward that video to Lyra? And did u send a thank you to Carolyn mulligan?
Yeah I sent it to lyra. I'll email carolyn tonight
Great. Tks. XO
Ps how did Lyra know about Simmons anyway?
I'm not sure, I'll ask
